Key.Original: Live Feed
Key.Chinese: 觀看畫面

Key.Original: Control Turret
Key.Chinese: 遙控砲台

Key.Original: Description :
Key.Chinese: 簡易描述 :

Key.Original: more details
Key.Chinese: 更多細項

Key.Original: Mark with...
Key.Chinese: 輸入標記方式...

Key.Original: Select Marker
Key.Chinese: 選擇地圖標記

Key.Original: Bearing...
Key.Chinese: 輸入方位...

Key.Original: Friendly forces are very close to the target, Range may vary depends on the ordnance or ROE.
Key.Chinese: 友軍部隊非常接近目標，距離可能會根據彈種或交戰規則而改變。

Key.Original: Weapon :
Key.Chinese: 武器 呼號 :

Key.Original: Task :
Key.Chinese: 任務 呼號 :

Key.Original: Laser :
Key.Chinese: 雷射 呼號 :

Key.Original: Firing cannon.
Key.Chinese: 發射 機炮、大砲。

Key.Original: Launch of A/G missile.
Key.Chinese: 發射 對地(A/G) 導彈。

Key.Original: Release of (Cluster/General-Purpose)bomb.
Key.Chinese: 投擲 (集束/通用) 炸彈。

Key.Original: Release of Laser-Guided bomb.
Key.Chinese: 投擲雷射導引炸彈。

Key.Original: Release multiple munitions in close succession.
Key.Chinese: 連續短時間內釋放多枚彈藥。

Key.Original: No ordnance remaining, can be used to against the specific target.
Key.Chinese: 沒有剩餘的彈藥可用於對特定目標。

Key.Original: Ammunition impact/target destroyed.
Key.Chinese: 彈藥〝命中/目標摧毀〞。

Key.Original: Oradance impact on ground, (Unofficial).
Key.Chinese: 彈藥在地面上的命中。(非官方證實)

Key.Original: How long the aircraft can be on station.
Key.Chinese: 飛機可以在站留多久時間。

Key.Original: Sighting of a specified reference point.
Key.Chinese: 目視 指定參照物。

Key.Original: Sighting of the friendly.opposite “Blind”.
Key.Chinese: 目視 友軍，與 “Blind” 相反。

Key.Original: Sighting of the target.opposite “No Joy”.
Key.Chinese: 目視 目標，與 “No Joy” 相反。

Key.Original: Give the plane clearance to attack.
Key.Chinese: 給予飛機攻擊許可。

Key.Original: Terminate the weapon release or mission.
Key.Chinese: 終止 武器釋放/任務。

Key.Original: Request for task result. “BDA”
Key.Chinese: 請求任務執行結果。“BDA”

Key.Original: Aircraft has reached IP begin to attack.
Key.Chinese: 飛機已達到IP，開始進行攻擊。

Key.Original: Aircraft has no fuel ,but return to base.
Key.Chinese: 飛機已無燃料，只能返回基地。

Key.Original: Continue present maneuver; does NOT imply clearance to engage.
Key.Chinese: 持續現有機動; “無”開火許可。

Key.Original: Call to begin Lasing at the target.
Key.Chinese: 呼叫開始在目標上照射雷射。

Key.Original: Callout for marking target by Laser.
Key.Chinese: 以雷射照射標記目標的呼號。

Key.Original: You have begun Lasing the target.
Key.Chinese: 你已經開始照射目標。

Key.Original: Jiggle/Pulse Laser on the target.
Key.Chinese: 在目標上的雷射 (水平)/(垂直) 擺動。

Key.Original: Steady the beam (Snake/Pulse).
Key.Chinese: 穩定雷射光束 (Snake/Pulse)。

Key.Original: When you spot the Laser designation.
Key.Chinese: 當你發現雷射目標。

Key.Original: Circling Laser around an aircraft.
Key.Chinese: 向飛機周圍搖晃雷射。

Key.Original: Provide a short summary of how the attack is going to be performed.%1%1 1. Type of the control (1,2 or 3)%1 2. Kind of the Attack (BOT/BOC)%1 3. Ordnance requested on target
Key.Chinese: 提供攻擊方式的簡要摘要。%1%1 1. 控制類型 (1、2或3) %1 2. 攻擊類型 (BOT/BOC) %1 3. 對目標的武器選項

Key.Original: “Alt + LMB” on the map to set marker%1%1“Initial Point” or “Battle Position”.%1%1IP for FW aircraft (Planes), the IP is the starting point for the run-in to the target. %1%1BP for RW aircraft (Helis), the BP is where attacks on the target are commenced.
Key.Chinese: 在地圖上使用 “Alt + 左鍵單擊” 來設置標記%1%1 “起始點(IP)” 或 “戰鬥位置(BP)” 。%1%1對於 固定翼 (飛機) 的 起始點 (IP) ，是開始進入目標的位置。%1%1對於 旋翼機 (直升機) 的 戰鬥位置 (BP)，是對目標進行攻擊的 起點及待命位置。

Key.Original: Heading and Offset.%1%1The heading is given in degrees magnetic from the “IP to target” or the center of the “BP to the target”. %1%1The offset is the side of the “IP to target” line on which aircrews can maneuver for the attack.
Key.Chinese: “飛行方向” 和 “偏移”。%1%1飛行方向以指北針角度表示，從 “起始點 (IP) 到目標” 或 “戰鬥位置 (BP) 的中心到目標”。 %1%1“偏移” 是指在 “起始點到目標” 的一側，人員可以在該側進行攻擊機動。

Key.Original: Distance.%1%1The distance “IP/BP to target”.
Key.Chinese: 距離。%1%1“IP/BP -> 目標” 的距離。

Key.Original: Target Elevation.%1%1The target elevation is given in %2 %5%3Feet%4 Mean Sea Level (MSL) unless otherwise specified.
Key.Chinese: 目標高度。%1%1目標高度以 海平面 (MSL) 計算，除非另有指定，以%2 %5%3英尺%4為單位。

Key.Original: Target Description.%1%1The description should be specific enough for the aircrew to recognize the target.
Key.Chinese: 目標描述。%1%1描述應該要足夠具體，以便人員能夠識別目標。

Key.Original: The target location.
Key.Chinese: 目標位置。

Key.Original: Mark Type/Terminal Guidance.%1%1The type of mark the JTAC/FAC(A) will use (for example, smoke(WP), laser, or IR). %1%1If using a laser, the JTAC/FAC(A) will also pass the call sign of the platform/ individual that will provide terminal guidance for the weapon and laser code.
Key.Chinese: 標記方式/終端引導。%1%1JTAC/FAC(A)將使用的標記類型 (例如，煙霧 (WP) 、雷射 或 紅外線) 。 %1%1如果使用雷射，JTAC/FAC(A)還要提供 個人呼號/使用平台/武器終端引導 和 雷射代碼。

Key.Original: Friendlies bearing from the target.%1%1Cardinal/sub-cardinal bearing from the target (N, NE, E, SE, S, SW, W, or NW) and distance of %2 %5%3closest friendlies%4 from the target in meters (e.g., “South 300”).
Key.Chinese: 友軍位置根據目標的方位。%1%1從目標的 基本/次基本 方位 (北、東北、東、東南、南、西南、西、西北) 和最近友軍離目標的距離，以公尺表示 (例如，“南方 300”) 以%2 %5%3最近的友軍%4為例。

Key.Original: Egress.%1%1These are the instructions the aircrews use to exit the target area.
Key.Chinese: Egress (撤離) 。%1%1這些是空中單位用來離開目標區域的指示。

Key.Original: Supplies additional important information.%1%1 1.%2 %5%3Troops in Contact%4 or %2 %5%3Danger Close%4%1 2.Final Attack Heading (FAH) or altitude restrictions %1 3.Threat %1 5.Active gun target lines %1etc
Key.Chinese: 提供額外重要資訊。%1%1 1. %2 %5%3處於交戰%4 或 %2 %5%3Danger Close%4%1 2. 最終攻擊方向 (FAH) 或 高度限制 %1 3. 區域威脅 %1 4. 正在使用的射擊槍線 %1等等

Key.Original: Friendly position (The closest one to the Target).%1GRID/TRP/bearing and range etc%1%1Marked by (smoke/VS-17 panel/beacon/GLINT/IR strobe etc.)
Key.Chinese: 友軍位置 (最接近目標的) 。%1GRID/TRP/方位和距離 等等%1%1由 (煙霧/VS-17面板/信標/GLINT/紅外線頻閃器 等等) 標記。

Key.Original: Target location. (GRID/TRP/bearing and range etc)
Key.Chinese: 目標位置 (GRID/TRP/方位和距離 等等) 。

Key.Original: Description of target%1Method used to mark ENY position. (IR, tracer etc)
Key.Chinese: 目標描述%1標記敵人位置的方法（紅外線、曳光彈等等）

Key.Original: Type 1 : %1JTAC can see target and Aircraft, and is for individual attacks.%1%1Type 2 : %1JTAC can see either the target or the aircraft (one or the other, not both) and is for individual attacks he must have real time data for the target from FO (Forward Observer)/Scout.%1%1Type 3 : %1Multiple attacks within a single engagement, JTAC can't see the aircraft but %2 %6'RobotoCondensedBold_BCE'%3must have real time data%4 from FO/Scout.
Key.Chinese: Type 1：%1JTAC能看到目標和飛機，並且用於個別攻擊。%1%1Type 2：%1JTAC可以看到目標或飛機(其中之一，而不是兩者兼具)，用於個別攻擊，他必須從FO(前線觀察員)/偵察兵那裡獲得實時目標數據。%1%1Type 3：%1在單一攻擊中進行多次攻擊，JTAC無法看到飛機，但%2 %5%3必須從FO(前線觀測員)/偵察兵%4那裡獲得實時數據。

Key.Original: What kind of the attack will be performed.%1%1BOT (Bomb on Target): %1Guns ,rockets and Laser guided ammunitions. %1Ex. Hydra70 GBU-12%1%1BOC (Bomb on Coordinate): %1GPS guided ammunitions. %1Ex. GBU-31 GBU-32 GBU-35
Key.Chinese: 將執行何種攻擊。%1%1BOT (Bomb on Target): %1機槍、火箭和雷射制導彈藥。%1例如：Hydra70、GBU-12%1%1BOC (Bomb on Coordinate): %1GPS制導彈藥。%1例如：GBU-31、GBU-32、GBU-35

Key.Original: What ammunition will be droped. %1How many. %1How far. %1etc
Key.Chinese: 將投放何種彈藥。%1用多少。%1多遠投放。%1等等
